panels.title: Application Status
panels.description: Shows whether the web application is currently UP or DOWN based on Prometheus 'up' metric. Useful for quick health checks.

panels.title: HTTP Requests per Second
panels.description: Displays the rate of incoming HTTP requests to the application. Helps monitor traffic volume and detect spikes or drops.

panels.title: Response Time (95th percentile)
panels.description: Tracks the 95th percentile of HTTP response times. Useful for identifying latency issues affecting user experience.

panels.title: HPA Replica Count
panels.description: Shows the current number of replicas managed by the Horizontal Pod Autoscaler. Indicates how the application scales under load.

panels.title: Ingress Request Rate
panels.description: Monitors the number of requests handled by the Ingress controller (NGINX or ALB). Useful for understanding external traffic patterns.

panels.title: Istio Request Duration (95th percentile)
panels.description: Displays the 95th percentile of request durations across Istio-managed services. Helps diagnose service mesh latency.

panels.title: ArgoCD App Sync Status
panels.description: Shows whether ArgoCD-managed applications are in sync with their Git repositories. Critical for GitOps workflows.

panels.title: Certificate Expiry (Days)
panels.description: Tracks how many days remain before TLS certificates expire. Helps prevent outages due to expired certs (via Cert Manager).

panels.title: Falco Alert Rate
panels.description: Displays the rate of Falco security alerts. Useful for detecting suspicious activity or policy violations in the cluster.
